paper_abstract: This paper is devoted to get the form of the solutions and the periodic nature of the following systems of rational difference equations x(n+1) = y(n-2)/-1 - y(n-2)x(n-1)y(n), y(n+1) = x(n-2)/+/- 1 +/- x(n-2)y(n-1)x(n), with initial conditions. x-2, x-1, x(0), y-2, y-1, y(0) are real numbers.
paper_title: Form of solutions and periodicity for systems of difference equations
